channel.title: Solved
channel.description: solved ty old rsc player and others for help

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:5, topic:306975”][quote author=Iron Maiden link=topic=403148.msg2986048#msg2986048 date=1254975168]
that pause thing does not work still closes cmd ill just do what ecko said kinda annoying but atleast it works
[/quote]

ant < bin

once u get there, I forget which ones, right click edit
~ant.bat
~antrun.bat
~ant.cmd
~antenv.cmd

not sure which one(s), but right click edit them all and add pause to the very end of each of them

go to your compile.bat
and add pause to the very bottom

run compile and should pause[/quote]

Only need to add pause in ‘‘ant.bat’’ and ‘‘compile.bat’’.

Read full topic

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Iron Maiden:

that pause thing does not work still closes cmd ill just do what ecko said kinda annoying but atleast it works

ant < bin

once u get there, I forget which ones, right click edit
~ant.bat
~antrun.bat
~ant.cmd
~antenv.cmd

not sure which one(s), but right click edit them all and add pause to the very end of each of them

go to your compile.bat
and add pause to the very bottom

run compile and should pause
